service_figures: INT has over 27 years of experience in delivering cloud, infrastructure, and DevOps services. The company has successfully managed over 11,000 client projects, demonstrating its capability in handling complex IT environments. INT has achieved significant impacts for clients, such as reducing costs by up to 80% and improving uptime by 99.9%. Their approach includes comprehensive assessments, intelligent infrastructure management, and seamless migration services, all aimed at optimizing performance and security.
